item.title: Philippines ex-leader Duterte arrested on ICC warrant over drug killings
item.description: Rodrigo Duterte is accused of 'crimes against humanity' in a crackdown that left thousands dead.

item.title: Largest drone attack of war hits Moscow region, Russian officials say
item.description: At least one person is killed, Russian officials say, in what appears to be the largest attack on Moscow of the war.

item.title: Rubio says Ukraine partial ceasefire plan 'has promise' ahead of talks
item.description: Russia has previously rejected a temporary ceasefire, calling it an attempt to buy time.

item.title: Uganda deploys troops to South Sudan - military chief
item.description: The soldiers will help South Sudan's president "secure" the capital, Uganda's Gen Kainerugaba says.

item.title: Indian plane diverted after two-thirds of onboard toilets clogged up
item.description: The plane's toilets broke down as they were clogged by plastic bags and clothes, "causing discomfort to all".
